attributes.action: Leave the EU, Enact Aunchluss with Australia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK, like every other nation has made foreign policy mistakes.  The biggest two that spring to mind are not keeping Australia and joining the EU.

We the undersigned petition the government to leave the EU, become part of the EEA and negotiate a mutually beneficial aunchluss with Australia.

In the coming decades we will need their uranium, as fossil fuel runs low they will need our nuclear deterent and 5th generation fighter aircraft to defend this vital resource from the more predatory superpowers.
